descriptionHtml:
What this mod does is that it stabilizes your health, magicka, and stamina when you're running around in the sun as a vampire. All it really does is regenerate your stats over time when having the ring equipped... There a so many things i would like to do with this mod... but i think it requires scripting which i have no skills in so... If there are anyone out there that wants to upgrade be my guest.

Should work with any vampire mod out there. 

Requirements: Skyrim (obviously) 




Ideas for The Daylight Ring.

Custom Model.
Only regenerates your health in the sun and not all the time.
remove the annoying sun damage sound when ring is equipped.
an option too look human when wearing the ring and out in the sun.
crafting it with rare materials.
Proper quest for obtaining the ring or more challenging.
maybe more to come.



As you can see i have a few ideas... but i cannot possible do this since i lack the skills and knowledge of such modding capabilities..



Anyway i hope you enjoy.
author: Lagarst
